content: <metadata>   <idinfo>     <citation>       <citeinfo>         <origin>City and County of Denver - Public Works City Surveyor's Office</origin>         <pubdate>20120808</pubdate>         <title>NGS HARN POINTS</title>         <geoform>vector digital data</geoform>       </citeinfo>     </citation>     <descript>       <abstract>This dataset contains National Geodetic Survey (NGS) High-Accuracy Reference Network (HARN) points commonly used by the Public Works survey group.</abstract>       <purpose>The purpose of this dataset is to allow users to integrate National Geodetic Survey (NGS) High-Accuracy Reference Network (HARN) data into engineering plans, proposed projects, etc.  Other NGS and U.S. Coast and Geodetic Survey (USCGS) benchmarks are portrayed in the ENG_SRVBENCHMARK_P dataset.</purpose>     </descript>     <status>       <update>As needed</update>     </status>     <spdom>       <bounding>         <westbc>-105.091578</westbc>         <eastbc>-104.621007</eastbc>         <northbc>39.914285</northbc>         <southbc>39.568104</southbc>       </bounding>     </spdom>     <keywords>       <theme>         <themekt>None</themekt>         <themekey>survey</themekey>       </theme>       <theme>         <themekt>ISO 19115 Topic Categories</themekt>         <themekey>elevation</themekey>         <themekey>location</themekey>         <themekey>planningCadastre</themekey>       </theme>       <place>         <placekt>None</placekt>         <placekey>Denver</placekey>         <placekey>Denver County</placekey>         <placekey>Colorado</placekey>         <placekey>USA</placekey>       </place>     </keywords>     <accconst>None</accconst>     <useconst>ACCESS CONSTRAINTS: This dataset restricted to City and County of Denver employees for official City business only.  Contact the GIS Administrator for more information on distribution requirements/restrictions.   USE CONSTRAINTS: The City and County of Denver is not responsible and shall not be liable to the user for damages of any kind arising out of the use of data or information provided by the City and County of Denver, including the installation of the data or information, its use, or the results obtained from its use.   ANY DATA OR INFORMATION PROVIDED BY THE City and County of Denver IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  Data or information provided by the City and County of Denver shall be used and relied upon only at the user's sole risk, and the user agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the City and County of Denver, its officials, officers and employees from any liability arising out of the use of the data/information provided.   NOT FOR ENGINEERING PURPOSES   </useconst>     <datacred>Public Works - City Surveyor's Office</datacred>     <secinfo>       <secsys>RESTRICT - 1</secsys>       <secclass>Restricted</secclass>       <sechandl>Read access to all city users via LVM (Locate View Map). Data available to those with access to SDE layers.</sechandl>     </secinfo>     <native>Microsoft Windows Server 2008 R2 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; ESRI ArcGIS 10.0.5.4400</native>   </idinfo>   <dataqual />   <spdoinfo>     <direct>Vector</direct>     <ptvctinf>       <sdtsterm>         <sdtstype>Entity point</sdtstype>         <ptvctcnt>38</ptvctcnt>       </sdtsterm>     </ptvctinf>   </spdoinfo>   <spref>     <horizsys>       <geograph>         <latres>8.9831528411952133e-009</latres>         <longres>8.9831528411952133e-009</longres>         <geogunit>Decimal Degrees</geogunit>       </geograph>       <geodetic>         <horizdn>D WGS 1984</horizdn>         <ellips>WGS 1984</ellips>         <semiaxis>6378137.0</semiaxis>         <denflat>298.257223563</denflat>       </geodetic>     </horizsys>   </spref>   <eainfo>     <detailed>       <enttyp>         <enttypl>ngs_harn_points</enttypl>       </enttyp>       <attr>         <attrlabl>OBJECTID</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Internal feature number.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs>         <attrdomv>           <udom>Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.</udom>         </attrdomv>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>SHAPE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Feature geometry.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs>         <attrdomv>           <udom>Coordinates defining the features.</udom>         </attrdomv>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>CCDPTID</attrlabl>         <attrdef>An internal index number for all City/County survey control points.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver Surveyor's Office.</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>COMMONNAME</attrlabl>         <attrdef>The name by which the NGS HARN point is commonly referred.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>CCDCORNERTYPE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>An internal classifier used to separate different classes of survey markers in the GIS Parcel Fabric.  For this layer, CCDCORNERTYPE will be "NGS HARN".</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>MONUMENTTYPE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>The basic physical appearance of the monument as it appears in the field.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>MONUMENTSOURCE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>The organization responsible for having set the monument in the field.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>MONUMENTSIZE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>The physical size of the monument, especially if it is a standard round survey disc or a rebar.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>SURVEYORLICENSENUMBER</attrlabl>         <attrdef>If available, the Colorado Professional Land Surveyor license number of the surveyor responsible placing the monument in the field.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>MONUMENTPROTECTION</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Any material or device used to protect a monument from damage or disturbance, such as a concrete pad or cast iron range box.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>SURVEYDATEGPS</attrlabl>         <attrdef>If available, the date that the monument was measured using Global Positioning System technology.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>SURVEYDATENAV88</attrlabl>         <attrdef>If available, the date that elevation was established for the monument by differential leveling.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>NAVD88SOURCE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>If available, the organization responsible for establishing the elevation of the monument by differential leveling.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>GPSSOURCE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>If available, the organization responsible for establishing the GPS location of the monument.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>STATEPLANECOORDINATEX</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Colorado State Plane Central Zone NAD83/92 easting in feet.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>STATEPLANECOORDINATEY</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Colorado State Plane Central Zone NAD83/92 northing in feet.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>CCD_LOCALX</attrlabl>         <attrdef>CCD Local coordinate system easting in feet.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>CCD_LOCALY</attrlabl>         <attrdef>CCD Local coordinate system northing in feet.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>NAV88ELEVATION</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Elevation of the benchmark in United States Survey Feet, North American Vertical Datum of 1988.</</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>CORNERPOINTTYPE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>This field is used primarily to distinguish between the several types of PLSS corner types.  Otherwise, it is a general classification based on pre-Parcel Fabric datasets.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>ALTERNATENAME</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Other names by which the HARN point may be called other than the Common Name.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>GPSID</attrlabl>         <attrdef>CCD GPS Point Identifier. Additional information about GPS locations can be found at O:\\PWENG\\SURVEY\\GPS\\DATA\\CCDGPSAL.XLS. If the value is zero, this point has not been officially GPS'd by CCD personnel.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>COORDINATEMETHOD</attrlabl>         <attrdef>The method by which the monument's GIS XY coordinate location was derived.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>EASTWESTSTREET</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Closest East /West avenue.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>NORTHSOUTHSTREET</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Closest North/South street.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>STREETADDRESS</attrlabl>         <attrdef>If available, the nearest street address.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>DESCRIPTION</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Description of the monument, including: Responsible Party, Monument Type and Size, and Proximity to Nearby Witness Features.  A carryover field from pre-Parcel Fabric datasets.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>COMMENTS</attrlabl>         <attrdef>A primary column for comments regarding the data record.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>NOTES</attrlabl>         <attrdef>A secondary column for comments regarding the data record.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>GLOBALID</attrlabl>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>ELLIPSOIDHEIGHT</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Ellipsoid height derived from GPS observation of the monument.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>     </detailed>   </eainfo>   <distinfo>     <distrib>       <cntinfo>         <cntorgp>           <cntorg>City and County of Denver, Technology Services / DenverGIS Data </cntorg>         </cntorgp>         <cntaddr>           <addrtype>unknown</addrtype>           <address>201 W Colfax Ave, Dept 301</address>           <city>Denver</city>           <state>CO</state>           <postal>80202</postal>           <country>USA</country>         </cntaddr>         <cntfax>720-913-5237</cntfax>         <cntemail>denvergis@denvergov.org</cntemail>         <hours>M-F 8:00am - 4:30pm (MT)</hours>       </cntinfo>     </distrib>     <distliab>See access and use constraints information.</distliab>   </distinfo>   <metainfo>     <metd>20150315</metd>     <metstdn>FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata</metstdn>     <metstdv>FGDC-STD-001-1998</metstdv>     <mettc>local time</mettc>   </metainfo> </metadata>
